content:
Good morning.
I configured OAI-PMH server for dataverse OAI_PMHserver.jpg but the URL https://dados.ipb.pt/oai returns an error.
internalerror.jpg

What can I do to solve this problem?
Thank you in advance.
sender_full_name: AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves

content:
Do you see io.gdcc.xoai.exceptions.BadVerbException: No argument 'verb' found in server.log? That's what I see.

It's coming from here: https://github.com/gdcc/xoai/blob/xoai-5.2.0/xoai-data-provider/src/main/java/io/gdcc/xoai/dataprovider/request/RequestBuilder.java#L119
@Oliver Bertuch any thought on this? Some kind of error makes sense (no verb) but a 500?

Philip Durbin said:

Oliver Bertuch any thought on this? Some kind of error makes sense (no verb) but a 500?

Hello again.
I checked logs and I saw that, when OAI sets were exported, a error log was created with the name 'export[timestamp].log'. In this log file I can see that no database was exported, because I can see the message 'Datasets exported successfully: 0'. How can I check what is hapening?
Thanks again :-)

And yes, in Server log I can see
'[Payara 5.2022.3] [WARNING] [] [javax.enterprise.web] [tid: _ThreadID=74 _ThreadName=http-thread-pool::http-listener-1(2)>
StandardWrapperValve[OAIServlet]: Servlet.service() for servlet OAIServlet threw exception

content: @AdÃ­lia Isabel Domingues da Cruz Alves sorry, I think I'm getting a little confused. Your current problem is that zero datasets are exported in your OAI-PHM set? Are any other sets working?
